name: Apache Airflow - Github Codespaces
postCreateCommand: curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && echo 'export PATH="/root/.cargo/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc && source ~/.bashrc &&apt-get update && cd /workspaces/airflow && uv venv .venv -p 3.11 && source .venv/bin/activate && uv tool install prek && prek install -f && prek install -t pre-push && uv tool install -e ./dev/breeze && mkdir -p files/airflow-breeze-config && echo 'AIRFLOW__CORE__SIMPLE_AUTH_MANAGER_ALL_ADMINS=True' > files/airflow-breeze-config/environment_variables.env && echo 'AIRFLOW__API__EXPOSE_CONFIG=True' >> files/airflow-breeze-config/environment_variables.env
